mapper.select: SELECT `name` FROM sesame_commodity_specifications WHERE del_flag = 1 AND sesame_commodity_id = #{commodityId}

SELECT `id`, open_id AS openId, sesame_commodity_id AS sesameCommodityId, sesame_commodity_open_id AS sesameCommodityOpenId, sesame_shop_id AS sesameShopId, sesame_shop_open_id AS sesameShopOpenId, `price`, `name`, `thumbnail` FROM sesame_commodity_specifications WHERE del_flag = 1 AND open_id = #{specificationsOpenId}

SELECT scs.`thumbnail` AS commodityThumbnail, sc.`name` AS commodityName, sc.`price` AS commodityPrice, scs.`name` AS specificationsName, ss.`name` AS shopName, scs.`open_id` AS specificationsOpenId FROM sesame_commodity_specifications scs LEFT JOIN sesame_commodity sc ON scs.sesame_commodity_id = sc.`id` LEFT JOIN sesame_shop ss ON scs.sesame_shop_id = ss.`id` WHERE scs.del_flag = 1 AND sc.del_flag = 1 AND sc.`enable` = 1 AND scs.open_id IN
#{item.specificationsOpenId}
